verses.text: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah came this word unto Jeremiah from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, saying ,
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to me; Make thee bonds and yokes , and put them upon thy neck ,\f + \fr 27.2 \ft saith…: or, hath the \+nd LORD\+nd* said\f*

And send them to the king of Edom , and to the king of Moab , and to the king of the Ammonites , and to the king of Tyrus , and to the king of Zidon , by the hand of the messengers which come to Jerusalem unto Zedekiah king of Judah ;

And command them to say unto their masters , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Thus shall ye say unto your masters ;\f + \fr 27.4 \ft to say…: or, concerning their masters, saying\f*
I have made the earth , the man and the beast that \add are\add* upon the ground , by my great power and by my outstretched arm , and have given it unto whom it seemed meet unto me.
And now have I given all these lands into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon , my servant ; and the beasts of the field have I given him also to serve him.
And all nations shall serve him, and his son , and his son’s son , until the very time of his land come : and then many nations and great kings shall serve themselves of him.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the nation and kingdom which will not serve the same Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon , and that will not put their neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon , that nation will I punish , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with the sword , and with the famine , and with the pestilence , until I have consumed them by his hand.

Therefore hearken not ye to your prophets , nor to your diviners , nor to your dreamers , nor to your enchanters , nor to your sorcerers , which speak unto you, saying , Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon :\f + \fr 27.9 \ft dreamers: Heb. dreams\f*
For they prophesy a lie unto you, to remove you far from your land ; and that I should drive you out , and ye should perish.

But the nations that bring their neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon , and serve him, those will I let remain still in their own land , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and they shall till it, and dwell therein. \p
¶ I spake also to Zedekiah king of Judah according to all these words , saying , Bring your necks under the yoke of the king of Babylon , and serve him and his people , and live.

Why will ye die , thou and thy people , by the sword , by the famine , and by the pestilence , as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath spoken against the nation that will not serve the king of Babylon ?
Therefore hearken not unto the words of the prophets that speak unto you, saying , Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon : for they prophesy a lie unto you.

For I have not sent them, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, yet they prophesy a lie in my name ; that I might drive you out , and that ye might perish , ye, and the prophets that prophesy unto you.\f + \fr 27.15 \ft a lie: Heb. in a lie, or, lyingly\f*

Also I spake to the priests and to all this people , saying , Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Hearken not to the words of your prophets that prophesy unto you, saying , Behold, the vessels of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* house shall now shortly be brought again from Babylon : for they prophesy a lie unto you.
Hearken not unto them; serve the king of Babylon , and live : wherefore should this city be laid waste ?

But if they \add be\add* prophets , and if the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be with them, let them now make intercession to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts , that the vessels which are left in the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \add in\add* the house of the king of Judah , and at Jerusalem , go not to Babylon. \p

¶ For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts concerning the pillars , and concerning the sea , and concerning the bases , and concerning the residue of the vessels that remain in this city ,
Which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon took not, when he carried away captive Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim king of Judah from Jerusalem to Babylon , and all the nobles of Judah and Jerusalem ;

Yea, thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts , the God of Israel , concerning the vessels that remain \add in\add* the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \add in\add* the house of the king of Judah and of Jerusalem ;
They shall be carried to Babylon , and there shall they be until the day that I visit them, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; then will I bring them up, and restore them to this place.
